Name: team_size_limit
Description: Team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: Project budget must not exceed the allocated amount

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 14 days

Name: skill_requirement
Description: Each team must have at least one member with each required skill

Name: blocker_severity
Description: Only high-severity blockers must be resolved before sprint end

Name: role_coverage
Description: Each team must have at least one Scrum Master and one Product Owner

Name: feature_priority
Description: Only high-priority features can be included in a release

Name: task_effort_limit
Description: No task should require more than 16 hours of effort

Name: stakeholder_relevance
Description: Only stakeholders with high relevance can participate in sprint reviews

Name: sprint_goal_clarity
Description: Every sprint must have exactly one sprint goal

Name: epic_status
Description: Only approved epics can be split into user stories

Name: user_story_acceptance
Description: All user stories must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: release_plan_status
Description: Only approved release plans can be part of the roadmap

Name: scrum_board_columns
Description: Every scrum board must have at least 3 columns
